subject: Naming convention for TestAll classes
msgSnippet: Is there something wrong with fully qualifying the AllTests classes in each package? JBR. ... Hello All, I build Test classes in many packages and now I want
messageBody:
Is there something wrong with fully qualifying the AllTests classes in each
package?

JBR.

----- Begin original message -----
Hello All,
I build Test classes in many packages and now I want make some
AllTest classes on different level of package hierarchy and in
different packages (and one root AllTest class too). These TestAll
classes can compose all test in subpackages.
<snip />

Example package structure (each level with few Test classes):
A
A.a
A.a.1.xxx
A.a.2.yyy
A.b
A.b.1.xxx
A.b.2.xxx
<snip />
